name: SCNPhysicsBallSocketJoint
desc: A physics behavior that connects two physics bodies and allows them to pivot around each other in any direction.

items.name: init(bodyA: SCNPhysicsBody, anchorA: SCNVector3, bodyB: SCNPhysicsBody, anchorB: SCNVector3)
items.desc: Creates a ball and socket joint connecting two physics bodies.

items.name: init(body: SCNPhysicsBody, anchor: SCNVector3)
items.desc: Creates a ball and socket joint that anchors a single physics body in space and allows it to rotate freely around an anchor point.

items.name: var bodyA: SCNPhysicsBody
items.desc: The first physics body connected by the joint.

items.name: var anchorA: SCNVector3
items.desc: The point at which the joint connects, relative to the node containing the first body.

items.name: var bodyB: SCNPhysicsBody?
items.desc: The second physics body connected by the joint.

items.name: var anchorB: SCNVector3
items.desc: The point at which the joint connects, relative to the node containing the second body.
